name: Qventus
headline: We automate operations for hospitals and health systems
description:
Qventus’ mission is to simplify how healthcare operates so it just works — for everyone. 

The company offers an AI-based software platform that helps hospital teams make better operational decisions in real-time. Qventus addresses operational challenges across the hospital including emergency departments, perioperative areas, patient safety, in-patient, outpatient and pharmacy. 

Located in Silicon Valley, Qventus is honored to be working with leading public, academic and community hospitals across the United States. 

Founded in 2012, Qventus was named among Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies for 2018. The company has also been recognized as a leader and innovator in operational excellence, with the 2016 Fierce Innovations Award in Healthcare and Healthcare Informatics 2017 Innovator Award. 

For more information about Qventus, please visit www.qventus.com

# Simplifying healthcare operations
Reduce staff workloads, unlock capacity, and grow your revenue with the industry leader in AI-powered automation solutions. 
[ Get started ](http://qventus.com/<https:/www.qventus.com/contact/>)
[ Explore our platform ](http://qventus.com/<https:/www.qventus.com/solutions/healthcare-automation-platform/>)
![A healthcare professional in scrubs using a Qventus automation solution on her tablet](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-283-1.png)

###### WHO WE SUPPORT
## Optimizing care flows for ORs & inpatient units
Discover how we help care teams make smarter decisions, reduce burnout, and improve the patient experience, using an innovative system of generative AI, machine learning, and behavioral science. 
SURGICAL SERVICES
INPATIENT CARE
LEADERSHIP
###### SURGICAL SERVICES
## Don’t just grow. Drive the _right_ growth.
Improving your surgical margins isn’t just about more volume. It’s about intelligently creating capacity, and filling your ORs with the cases that matter most to your organization and community. Learn how our AI teammates harmonize your strategic growth strategy with your operations to add 3+ strategic cases per OR per month 
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/</solutions/surgical-services>)
![A healthcare professional in scrubs who uses the Qventus perioperative solution to schedule surgeries](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Group-244-1-1-889x1024.png)
###### INPATIENT CARE
## Reduce length of stay and create capacity
Seamlessly embedded into your EHR, our AI teammates automate your discharge planning, orchestrate ancillary services and close care gaps to get patients home sooner- enabling hospitals to reduce excess days for all patients by up to half a day. 
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/</solutions/inpatient-length-of-stay>)
![Two healthcare professionals in scrubs using the Qventus inpatient solution to streamline discharge planning](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Img_1_1-4-878x1024.png)
###### LEADERSHIP
## Stay competitive by supercharging your staff
Qventus AI teammates tackle the tedious, below-license administrative processes that cause burnout for your frontline staff.
We also provide one-of-a-kind insights into your market so you can get a leg up on the competition.
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/</solutions/healthcare-system-facility-leadership>)
![A healthcare professional in scrubs helping a patient walk through a hospital](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Img_1_1-3-1-970x1024.png)
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Honor-Health-1-1.svg)“We’ve been able to do wonderful things for throughput with Qventus.”
Find out how we helped HonorHealth streamline patient flow and optimize OR scheduling.
[Read HonorHealth’s story](http://qventus.com/</resources/customer-successes/honorhealth>)
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Boston_Medical_Center_logo-1.svg)“We are so much further ahead today because of Qventus.”
See how partnering with Qventus helped BMC solve critical capacity and staffing challenges.
[Read BMC’s story](http://qventus.com/</resources/customer-successes/boston-medical-center-bmc%20>)
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/allina_health_logo-1.svg)“Qventus is vastly superior to anything our EHR would bolt on.”
See how we helped Allina Health unlock 36% robotics and 18% spine growth.
[Read Allina Health’s story](http://qventus.com/</resources/customer-successes/allina-health>)
###### QVENTUS PRODUCTS
## Explore our AI-powered operational solutions
![Two surgeons performing a surgical procedure schedule using the Qventus perioperative solution](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Img_1_1-21-1-1024x631.jpg)
### Maximize OR utilization
Unlock access, delight your surgeon offices, and modernize your operations with a capacity optimization solution that powers strategic service line growth. 
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/<https:/www.qventus.com/solutions/operating-room-utilization/>)
![A healthcare professional in scrubs using her workstation to create a discharge plan with the Qventus inpatient solution](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Img_1_1-1-1-1024x631.jpg)
### Drive down excess days
Optimize discharge planning, relieve overburdened staff, and maximize bed capacity with an automated inpatient care solution that reduces LOS right from the EHR. 
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/<https:/www.qventus.com/solutions/discharge-planning/>)
###### OUR PLATFORM
## Seamless operational automation starts here
Built on a foundation of AI, machine learning, and behavioral science, our platform gives you the power to predict bottlenecks, identify remedies, and automate processes that simplify care flows—all with full, bi-directional EHR integration. 
[ Learn more ](http://qventus.com/<https:/www.qventus.com/solutions/healthcare-automation-platform/>)
##### Qventus Automation Platform
![A diagram of the Qventus healthcare operations automation platform, including data sources, core components, and Qventus solutions](https://www.qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-250-1-1024x546.png)
###### EXPLORE
## More updates, education & customer stories
Leaders at Banner Health share best practices and practical takeaways from their path to maximized OR capacity. [Watch now](http://qventus.com/</resources/resource-library/webinar-on-demand-banner-health/>)
WEBINARBanner Health's journey to optimized OR utilization

KLAS REPORTEmerging Solutions Spotlight: Qventus

# Simplifying healthcare operations
Reduce staff workloads, unlock capacity, and grow your revenue with the industry leader in AI-powered automation solutions. 
 Get started ⟨48⟩
 Explore our platform ⟨5⟩

###### WHO WE SUPPORT
## Optimizing care flows for ORs & inpatient units
Discover how we help care teams make smarter decisions, reduce burnout, and improve the patient experience, using an innovative system of generative AI, machine learning, and behavioral science. 
SURGICAL SERVICES
INPATIENT CARE
LEADERSHIP
###### SURGICAL SERVICES
## Don’t just grow. Drive the _right_ growth.
Improving your surgical margins isn’t just about more volume. It’s about intelligently creating capacity, and filling your ORs with the cases that matter most to your organization and community. Learn how our AI teammates harmonize your strategic growth strategy with your operations to add 3+ strategic cases per OR per month 
 Learn more ⟨20⟩
![A healthcare professional in scrubs who uses the Qventus perioperative solution to schedule surgeries⟨66⟩]
###### INPATIENT CARE
## Reduce length of stay and create capacity
Seamlessly embedded into your EHR, our AI teammates automate your discharge planning, orchestrate ancillary services and close care gaps to get patients home sooner- enabling hospitals to reduce excess days for all patients by up to half a day. 
 Learn more ⟨23⟩
![Two healthcare professionals in scrubs using the Qventus inpatient solution to streamline discharge planning⟨67⟩]
###### LEADERSHIP
## Stay competitive by supercharging your staff
Qventus AI teammates tackle the tedious, below-license administrative processes that cause burnout for your frontline staff.
We also provide one-of-a-kind insights into your market so you can get a leg up on the competition.
 Learn more ⟨26⟩
![A healthcare professional in scrubs helping a patient walk through a hospital⟨68⟩]
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Honor-Health-1-1.svg)“We’ve been able to do wonderful things for throughput with Qventus.”
Find out how we helped HonorHealth streamline patient flow and optimize OR scheduling.
Read HonorHealth’s story⟨69⟩
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Boston_Medical_Center_logo-1.svg)“We are so much further ahead today because of Qventus.”
See how partnering with Qventus helped BMC solve critical capacity and staffing challenges.
Read BMC’s story⟨70⟩
![](http://qventus.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/allina_health_logo-1.svg)“Qventus is vastly superior to anything our EHR would bolt on.”
See how we helped Allina Health unlock 36% robotics and 18% spine growth.
Read Allina Health’s story⟨71⟩
###### QVENTUS PRODUCTS
## Explore our AI-powered operational solutions
![Two surgeons performing a surgical procedure schedule using the Qventus perioperative solution⟨72⟩]
### Maximize OR utilization
Unlock access, delight your surgeon offices, and modernize your operations with a capacity optimization solution that powers strategic service line growth. 
 Learn more ⟨11⟩
![A healthcare professional in scrubs using her workstation to create a discharge plan with the Qventus inpatient solution⟨73⟩]
### Drive down excess days
Optimize discharge planning, relieve overburdened staff, and maximize bed capacity with an automated inpatient care solution that reduces LOS right from the EHR. 
 Learn more ⟨14⟩
###### OUR PLATFORM
## Seamless operational automation starts here
Built on a foundation of AI, machine learning, and behavioral science, our platform gives you the power to predict bottlenecks, identify remedies, and automate processes that simplify care flows—all with full, bi-directional EHR integration. 
 Learn more ⟨5⟩
##### Qventus Automation Platform
![A diagram of the Qventus healthcare operations automation platform, including data sources, core components, and Qventus solutions⟨74⟩]

generated_description:
### Qventus: Simplifying Healthcare Operations Through AI

**Mission:**  
Qventus is dedicated to automating hospital operations, making healthcare work seamlessly for everyone involved.

**What They Do:**  
Starting as an initiative to simplify healthcare processes, Qventus has transformed into an AI-driven software platform that empowers hospital staff to make data-informed decisions in real-time. Their solutions tackle various operational challenges across hospitals—from emergency departments to perioperative coordination, outpatient services, and pharmacies.

**Location and Team:**  
Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Silicon Valley, Qventus has a robust team of 163 employees and is part of the Y Combinator Batch W15.

**Recognition:**  
Qventus has garnered accolades for its innovative approach, including being listed among Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies in 2018 and receiving the Fierce Innovations Award in 2016.

#### Key Offerings:
- **Operational Automation:** Leverages AI, machine learning, and behavioral science to streamline healthcare workflows.
- **AI Operational Assistants:** These AI systems help care teams focus on high-level tasks, alleviating administrative burdens.
- **Surgical Growth Solutions:** Focuses on intelligent automation to enhance surgical growth and efficiency.
- **Inpatient Capacity Management:** Automates processes to enhance patient flow and maximize bed capacity.
- **Perioperative Care Coordination:** Aims to improve perioperative operations by streamlining patient admission and discharge processes.

#### The Impact:
By implementing Qventus solutions, hospitals have reported significant improvements, including:
- **Up to 72%** utilization of released operating room time.
- **Reduction of patient length of stay** by as much as 1 day.
- **Enhanced surgical capacity,** with reports of tripling robotic procedure volumes.

#### Company Values:
Qventus believes in simplifying healthcare not just for the sake of operational efficiency but also to enhance the overall patient experience and reduce staff burnout. Their goal is to unlock healthcare's unused capacity and drive strategic growth for hospitals and health systems.

For more information about how Qventus is transforming healthcare operations, visit [Qventus.com](http://qventus.com).
